description: Office furniture for workspaces, to be delivered and installed on an as-needed basis in the National Capital Region.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title**:
---------------

EH990-230549: Workspaces RFSO Cat 1,2,3,5

**Reference Number**:
-------------------

WS3686172751-Doc3686345965

**Solicitation Number**:
-----------------------

WS3686172751

**Publication Date**:
-------------------

2022-09-28

**Tender Closing Date**:
------------------------

2022-11-04T14:00:00 (Applicants must submit their bid by 2:00 PM GMT)

**Procurement Category**:
-----------------------

* GD

**Trade Agreements**:
-------------------

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Notice Type**:
----------------

Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

**Procurement Method**:
-------------------------

Competitive - Selective tendering

**Categories**:
----------------

* Screens for panel systems
* Work surfaces for panel systems
* Freestanding lighting or power or data components
* Freestanding storage

**Regions of Opportunity**:
---------------------------

 National Capital Region (NCR)

**Regions of Delivery**:
--------------------------


**Contact Information**:
-------------------------

*  Michelle Wong
*  Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*  Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
*  Phone: None
*  Email: michelle.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*  Fax: None
*  Attachment(s): None



**Amendment**
-------------

This notice was amended on November 3, 2022. The closing date has been extended to November 4, 2022.

End of details
---------------

This RFSO will govern the supply, delivery, and installation of office furniture on an as-and-when requested basis
